text: Kantriba bar an apengan ikɨ, egh uaghan an otarim ko, an igiav otarir gɨn otivamim sara men apengan ikiam. Me Babilonɨn apengan ikɨ mangɨ, kɨ Babilon gasɨghasɨghamin dughiar kɨ mɨsevezimɨn tugham. Dughiar kamɨn, kantrin avɨriba ko atrivir gavgaviba Babilonɨn dɨkabɨragh, me damutɨ me pura men ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar otivigham.
